name: The Silence (itch) (ShnapennWorlds)
description:
THE SILENCE

My second Unity solo project: a small RPG scene with dialogues and rock-paper-scissor combat against evil mimes, done as a final assignment for Scripting 3: Technical Architecture. 

This is a single-scene test project created to try my hands at:
- ScriptableObjects
- Dialogue system
- Conflict system
- Equipement system and Inventory window
- Save and Load system

CONTROLS:
Move with A and D or Left and Right arrows
Press I for Inventory
Press Escape for Menu
Click on items in the Inventory to equip and unequip them

Note: I tried to do the Save/Load feature using ScriptableObjects, and it turns out it only works within the same playthrough. Save slots will reset if you leave the game. I may or may not change it to a fully functioning system.
